caption:
Gut health isn’t just about digestion- it can be connected to immune health, skin health, energy levels, and mood.
 
Within the realm of integrative medicine, there are many ingredients that can be used to support the gut microbiome, increase the integrity of the intestinal barrier, and provide anti-inflammatory effects. Our Gut Builder supplement has thoughtfully combined ingredients like L-glutamine, fiber, marshmallow, ginger, and pomegranate to support the GI tract and optimize digestive well-being.
 
L-glutamine is the primary fuel source for enterocytes (the cells that line the intestines).
 
Fiber acts as a fuel source for members of the gut microbiome (bacteria that live in the gut).
 
Marshmallow is a demulcent herb, meaning it contains mucilage (a gel-like substance) that can coat and soothe the lining of the GI tract.
 
Ginger is a great anti-inflammatory herb that can soothe symptoms of indigestion and nausea and stimulate digestive enzymes.
 
Pomegranates are packed with antioxidants and can be metabolized by the gut microbiome to produce anti-inflammatory molecules.
 
Speak to your health care provider to learn about which supplements are right for your unique health goals and concerns.
